item.title: OpenAPI to Function Calling: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: Learn how to convert OpenAPI specs to AI-usable functions for smarter API interactions.

item.title: Defensive Distillation
item.description: An exploration of defensive distillation techniques to protect neural networks against adversarial attacks

item.title: About
item.description: I got my Master’s degree in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from the Coimbatore Institute of Technology. Currently, I work as an AI researcher/Engineer at RocketFrog.ai in India. During my studies and early career, I developed a strong interest in AI and machine learning applications, which I’ve been able to explore through various professional experiences. I had the opportunity to work as an AI Researcher/Engineer and a Founding Member at Sayvai, and as an AI/ML Intern at Bosch Global Software Technologies.
